description:
This module aims to provide students with the opportunities to develop communication skills that are essential for human resource professionals to not only fulfil a transactional, functional HR role, but also to effectively support strategic business objectives. The module will cover topics including :

- Foundational communication principles and frameworks in an organisational context
- Communicating to connect (e.g., positive people skills, empathy, emotional intelligence, active listening, collaboration)
- Communicating to influence (e.g., persuasion tactics, mediating between organisational stakeholders, feedback giving).

Cases of challenging scenarios of HR communication and experiential activities will be used to facilitate learning and skill development.
title: Communication for HR Professionals
